page.title: Reebok Posts Higher Earnings, Stock Up
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Athletic shoe and apparel maker Reebok International Ltd. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=RBK.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">RBK.N</A> on Thursday posted better-than-expected quarterly earnings on an acquisition and the weak dollar, sending its shares up more than 3 percent.
